TaskName: REQUIRED Task label is derived from this field by removing all non alphanumeric characters. Note this does not have to be a behavioral task that subjects perform, but can reflect some information about the conditions present when the data was acquired: e.g. rest/resteyesopen/resteyesclosed/sleep
ElectricalStimulationParameters: describe CCEP parameters here in words: Single pulse stimulation with a square wave biphasic pulse, 200 microsecond duration, 6mA amplitude, delivered about every 5 seconds
